headline: Ruthie’s Scandinavian Christmas Cookies
name: Ruthie’s Scandinavian Christmas Cookies
description: These quick holiday cookies are made with only six ingredients, including chopped pecans and whole wheat pastry flour. Roll or dust them in sugar and enjoy!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup additional confectioners’ sugar for dusting or rolling

recipeInstructions.text: Combine butter, pastry flour, 1 cup confectioners' sugar, pecans, water, and vanilla extract in a bowl; mix until well combined.
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Roll dough into 1 tablespoon-size balls and set on the prepared baking sheet.
Working in batches, bake in the preheated oven until bottoms are light golden brown but tops are still pale, about 14 minutes.
Let cookies cool completely. Dust or roll them in confectioner’s sugar.
